name: Gemdoku: Wood Block Puzzle
description:
GEMDOKU is a new wooden block puzzle game played on a 9x9 sudoku grid. Your mind will be sharpened and recharged while playing this woody block puzzle game.

GEMDOKU is a free wood block 99 puzzle that gives you a great brain training experience. It is an easy game to play but hard to master! Test your IQ. Wood block puzzle games meet with classic sudoku grid in this jigsaw woody 99 puzzle.

Place and match the blocks on the board and fill rows, columns or 3x3 squares to clear them from the game. Play as much as you want. Play before you run out of space to beat your high score. You may have 1 more chance to continue after failing. Gemdoku is successful mixture of sudoku and IQ block puzzles. Experience a colorful gem adventure by challenging yourself.

GEMDOKU features:
● Beautiful wood graphics and satisfying sound and visual effects
● Sharpen your mind with awesome GEMs and graphics
● Wood style block game.
● No time limit, no pressure
● Easy and simple but still challenging
● Challenging to break your own records
● Fun for all ages: The best game for family & friends’ gatherings!
● Download this funny game for free.
● Great exercise for the brain.
● Simple and highly addictive gameplay to master.
● Free to play and play without the internet.
● Play offline and free.
● Quiet Zen game that’s easy to learn.
● Wood, sunrise and twilight Color themes. Play as a colorful puzzle game or a classic wooden block puzzle.

How to become a master:
● Drag shapes onto the board to place them on the grid which should be familiar to all sudoku fans, to build lines and squares.
● Fill any row, column, or 3x3 square to clear blocks from the board.
● Clear multiple rows, columns, or squares to earn Combo points.
● Earn as many points as you can to beat your high score!
● Clear blocks every turn to get streak points
● Try to merge colorful and woody sudoku blocks on the puzzle board to destroy lines or 3x3 squares.
● Complete Challenges in the block puzzles and get unique trophies.

The Gems in this game may not be the most powerful artifacts in the universe, but they will give you joy.

Play GEMDOKU anytime, anywhere!
